title: One-Pot Chicken and Rice
instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in large pot. 2. Sauté onion and garlic until fragrant. 3. Add chicken, cook until browned. 4. Add rice and broth, bring to boil. 5. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 20 minutes. 6. Stir in peas, cook 5 more minutes. 7. Season with salt and pepper.
